attributes.action: Create a scheme for free travel to anyone on any public transport.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This would mean transport is used more and that the roads are less congested. This would help the less well off and those without transport as well as increase the reliability of public transport.

rejection.details: There are several petitions on this theme e.g. http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/FREETRANSPORT/ Please consider signing one before opening a new petition.
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
